title: Write pre-execution.md gate
description: Create the pre-execution validation gate that checks task readiness: status check, dependency check, difficulty check (must break down if >= 7), context check for files_affected, and pattern availability check. Blocks execution if critical checks fail.
notes: Created pre-execution.md gate with 5 checks: status check (BLOCKING), dependency check (BLOCKING), difficulty check for >=7 (BLOCKING), context check for files_affected (WARNING), and pattern availability check (INFO).
